q1: Mexico would be nice to play again
a1: I enjoy watching Héctor Herrera play.
q2: Do you think Mexico can win the Gold Cup?
a2: They have a good shot after their strong performances at the World Cup. Especially with players like Herrera and Lozano
q3: They need to up their game to go the final distance though surely?
a3: Yes, they need a few more players to be able to compete at the top level.
q4: who is the best player in the mexico team
q5: Is Hernandez good as a striker?
a5: Hernandez is one of the best finishers in the game.
